channel.title: Education on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Education on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: French classes came to an end
item.description: Well my French classes came to an end. And I passed the exam :D I would like to take up the Oscar podium for few seconds and like to thank my beloved wife Pamela for her support ; my teacher, my colleagues- Stephan and Fred for their time and effort to make me understand the basics of French grammar. And I am very satisfied that I didn’t let them down as I scored well in grammar and got all the Pass√©-compose and Imparfait (past tense) correct.
